resources.string: Click to activate or deactivate SU
Current SU not supported.\nThe app only works with CM-SU\nDevice current SU version is:
Empty… Device appears not to be Rooted
If the device is reboot with SU off it will do one reboot during boot in bootlogo screen. This is need to have SU working.
This is a open source app check it on my github\ngithub.com/bhb27/isu
A simple app to deactivate SU at will and pass safety net verification, today it works only on SU binary of CM base ROM\'s
